name: Great Work Perks
overview:
Great Work Perks provides a free employee discount program to 2,000 Greater Los Angeles companies and their 300K+ employees. Our member companies include Paramount Pictures, Saint Johns Hospital, Northrop Grumman, Warner Bros.,Yahoo!, Children’s Hospital LA, MTV, Siemens, DIRECTV, Neutrogena, and over 1,500 others. These companies use our turn-key program to save time and resources and to improve employee morale. Large companies use us to bolster their current employee offerings with premium perks and small companies enjoy the ability to provide a new benefit to their employees. The quality of our local perks is unmatched and their are no hidden fees to your company or to your employees.

Our premium perks include:

  • Spas like Burke Williams
  • Restaurants such as Morton’s Steak House, Pasta Pomodoro, The Geisha House, Tengu, Bella, Dolce, Acupulco and many more
  • Shows at the Pantages and Ahmanson theaters
  • LA Clippers, LA Dodgers & LA Galaxy up to 50% off tickets
  • Amusement Parks discounts at Disneyland, Aquarium of the Pacific, Knott’s Berry Farm and more!
  • Wide variety of discounts on LA activities including Chef Makers Cooking Academy, Malibu Horseback Riding, Hang gliding, Golf & Tennis lessons, Sailing, Surfing, ATV off-roading & Skydiving
